Reviews.Title: “We loved it!! ”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We went to Florida to get married and stayed here for two weeks, the rooms were spotless and the management and staff were amazing and could't do enough for us. It was much better than our third week at Howard Johnson Maingate West. If the management read this hope you are all well and we hope to see you next year with our family. Room 163 24th June 2004

Reviews.Title: “Great Crew - especially liked the odd job/gardener guy”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The Kissimmee Pines was a great place to stay as you felt you were in someones home. Sonia looks after her guests really well. There is always fresh coffee available in the kitchen and aftersun if you need it! I loved the gardener/odd job man who was always about on the complex, he`ll tell you all about the flowers and the turtles in the pen, and just about anything else you want to know. Mike`s the tall dishy one in the office who will organise lifts and has great info to hand. Last but not least Matt the rep,-look out for the dinky shorts he wears <G>.Organiser of great trips especially the ones where you go in a limo.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT !!!”
Reviews.Author: bazaa
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in some real swanky hotels and some real dumps - but we just loved this place. Small, cosy set-up, built around a good size, clean pool. Great staff, great parking and good clean rooms. Dont be put off by this being in a semi-residential area, just off highway 192 - the natives are real friendly !!! Stayed in other places since, but none as good as this. LOVED IT !!!

Reviews.Title: “A OK”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: A bit far from attractions but a nice relaxing place. Staff were most helpful and friendly, rooms basic but comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “I was thinking this was going to be a **** hole!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had read all the bad bits about the hotel on this website against the minute good bits, and, thinking the worst we travelled to our holiday apartment in sunny Florida!!!!! What a shock, the place was much better than whe **** I heard about from some of the people that wrote on here. They ran a cheap shuttle service (never get a yellow cab unless you specify price first......cos they cahnge their fares willy nilly-there is a cheap late nite taxi company called county transportation on 407-396-0003-they are the cheapest about 17 dollars to Disney for 2 people yellow cabs are about 36 dollars!!!) Anyway, the people who work at the pines are not horrible, they are the nicest guys who go out of their way to help you!!!!! They tell you what parks to go to cos they are busier if they have special shows etc, and they do deals for you all the time to make your stay more enjoyable. The rooms are basic but clean and very nice....good programs on the portable while you get ready to go out....but annoying American advert every 5 mins!!!! Sonia (Manager sexy Brazilian!!), Mike (Good hunky bloke whose a laugh) and the lovable James (Sweet driver from Arkansas) What a crew of people!!!!!! Lovely guys and Matt the surfer looking dude what a rep very helpful, even if you wake him up during the night (He's the emergency contact!!!) GO HERE IT IS CHEAP AND GREAT!!!!! WINGHOUSE IS A GREAT PLACE TO EAT TOO ESP. FOR BLOKES!!!!!! The shop and pizzaria opposite have friendly people working in, and if you do feel intimidated by locals, just say hello to them, they are real nice people, not at all intimidating.....I think they are in awe of you!!!!! HAve a GREAT HOLIDAY WHO ELSE IS GOING, I AM GOING BACK WITH ALL MY FRIENDS NEXT YEAR!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “would not stay again”
Reviews.Author: nickyKent
Reviews.Content: The hotel standard was very poor and nothing like the brochure picture, the room was dirty and the walls were stained, the kettle has to be boiled on the floor and the walls are paper thin. Stayed on a room only basis and found the local shops and residential area very intimidating, this is not sour grapes just an honest view from someone who looked forward to comfortable accommodation to base the holiday from. In the room only accommodation there is no control over heat or cold, no chairs to sit on and nothing in the way of comfort. Extremely dissappointed and even paid extra to move hotels in order to enjoy what remained of our holiday, the staff were angry that we complained to the rep and were rude and very unhelpful. The safety deposit box is not free you pay a daily rate for this, and you are provided with polystyrene cups no spoon, and our room was not cleaned once in 5 days.

Reviews.Title: “This was the worst place I have ever stayed, definitely not a 2 star plus!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Don't think about staying here it is horrendous. I find it very strange that there are so many people who are giving Kissimmee Pines the 'thumbs up'. My partner and I stayed at Kissimmee Pines between end Feb and beginning March 2004. This is the worst place I have ever stayed. The accomodation was filthy, the towels never changed, we had to balance a kettle to boil on a waste bin, there was a smell of fumes in the room that gave us headaches and sickness. The doors on either side of the room wouldn't open properly and when they did then we couldn't lock them. During our stay the temperature in Orlando was quite low and we couldn't locate a control to turn on the air conditioning/heating. We contacted our tour rep as it wasn't made apparent how to contact the manager/reception. When we were shown the air condition/temp control it was covered over with a metal box that had to be opened by the owner with a key. Mike (manager/owner?) adjusted the temp with our rep present and then when we went out for the day turned it off completely! The result of our stay at the Kissimmee Pines was that the staff accused us of 'trashing' a door (which I had already reported as not opening or closing properly, at the commencement of our stay and him wanting us to pay for a new door. This all ended up with my partner and I having had enough abuse from the staff and manager/owner, that we paid to move to other accomodation in Kissimmee. NB. We were not the only people who moved - on the same day at least two other parties of people moved to other accomodation due to the same problems. My partner and I were both verbally abused and shouted at by the staff and treated disgustingly. When we reported problems they weren't dealt with and the manager verbally abused us when we asked to move to another room and also when we went to check out to move to another hotel. This accomodation is smack bang in the middle of a 'residential' district (very unsavoury area)and during our stay - which lasted 5 hellish days - at 4am on one morning the police arrived with sirens blaring, at a house on the estate at the side of our apts, no more than 100 feet away. The police broke down the door to the house and dragged out a man and put him in the back of the police vehicle. There is a 'local' shop across the road from kissimmee pines, that sells the various essential items you need ie. soap, milk, coffee, tea, cigarettes etc. There is also a 'cafe' on the same block as the shop. The locals tend to hang about inside and outside both and when inside the shop follow you around and watch you paying at the till (very intimidating) and then follow you outside. We both did not feel at all safe around this area. My partner and I will never, ever stay at this accomodation again and I would strongly recommend that any other people thinking to stay at Kissimmee Pines should rethink and stay somewhere else. Otherwise you risk your holiday being completely ruined as our holiday was. Please take our experience of this accomodation seriously. We would not want anyone else to have to go through the things we endured at the Kissimmee Pines.

Reviews.Title: “BEST HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: BEST HOTEL IN DISNEY!!!!Fantastic stay. Warm, friendly reception. Houses are affordable and new and clean. Tennis supplies and basketball available all the time as well swimming.WE WILL RETURN

Reviews.Title: “great hol!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last year, lovely holiday. Owners exceptionally helpful Returning again in Nov2003

Reviews.Title: “the best!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Kissimmee Pines in April 2003 cannot rate it highly enough the accomadation was spot less any problems were delt with immediatly the staff were more like friends nothing was to much trouble for them. If you are reading this at Kissimmee Pines, Will and Carol say a BIG high we will be back!!

Reviews.Title: “It was great!”
Reviews.Author: Lakey2
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Kissimmee Pines for 12 nights and, for the money, I don't know how they do it! We had two ensuite rooms which were clean and comfortable, there was a great swimming pool and plenty of parking spaces as well as some convenience stores over the road. The location is great as it's sooo close to Highway 192 but quiet and secluded in a residential area. We would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Kissimme Pines for 14 days and had a great time. Mike and Alex and the rest of the staff were very helpful. The room was clean and tidy and only lacked an armchair for sitting and reading. But there is just so much to do in the area we didn't have much time for reading. The bed was very comfortable and the air-conditioning worked fine. The 192 is a short walk away with lots of eating places. We would be happy to stay there again.

HotelInfo.Name: Pines, Aparthotel
HotelInfo.Address: 3220 West Oak Street, Kissimmee, FL 34741
